targets.expr: sum by (pod, node, iface) (rate(egress_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", node=~"$node"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Pod Egress Bandwidth by Node and ENI

targets.expr: sum by (pod, node, iface) (rate(ingress_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", node=~"$node"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Pod Ingress Bandwidth by Node and ENI
